summary: This bill, the Tech Safety for Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act, proposes a pilot program to combat technology-related abuse in domestic violence cases. It authorizes the Director of the Office on Violence Against Women to award grants to eligible consortia (comprising institutions of higher education with tech expertise and victim service providers) to provide resources and support to victims, including new devices. The bill also establishes a grant program for education and training on technological abuse. It aims to address the growing issue of tech-facilitated abuse and offer assistance to victims.
